about.title: About
about.heading: 🚀 Welcome to my Development Journey!
about.description: Hello, I'm Harry Seymour, a passionate software developer based in the picturesque south of England. This temporary portfolio site is a glimpse into the diverse projects that have fueled my journey in the tech world.

content.subContent: My development journey has been marked by versatility. From .NET and SQL in the corporate realm to Python, C, and C++ for computer vision and machine learning applications, I've embraced a wide array of technologies. My hands-on experience extends to embedded systems, dipping into the intricacies of low-level languages, and even delving into basic electronics.

My foundation lies in cognitive and developmental neuropsychology. A master's degree enriched my understanding, incorporating advanced statistics and sparking my interest in data processing and analysis using Python and MATLAB.

In the dynamic landscape of software development, I've played pivotal roles in high-profile defense contracts, honed frontend skills for industry leaders, and explored the realm of mobile development. My journey has seen me navigating complex codebases, contributing to bespoke ground stations, and even managing long-range camera feeds for critical surveillance applications.

Outside the digital realm, I wear the hats of a close-up magician and an enthusiastic rock climber. These pursuits offer a refreshing balance to the intricacies of coding and serve as a testament to my diverse interests.

With a robust foundation and a passion for innovation, my next horizon involves pursuing an MEng in Computer Science. The goal is to further elevate my skills and contribute meaningfully to the evolving landscape of technology.
I invite you to explore this snapshot of my journey, projects, and interests. Let's connect and delve into the possibilities of collaboration and shared exploration in the vast realm of technology!
